## docker.DockerImageInstance.image property

Returns information about the version of the Docker image that reflects the current set of props for the component.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
image: ImageInfo | undefined;
```

## Remarks

This property returns undefined if no image has ever been built by this component OR if the component props have changed and the image that corresponds to the current props has not yet been built.
